Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value and benefits, I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to you. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $10,800. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire such a high-quality product at a discounted rate. I believe this offer presents a fantastic value for you, considering the product's worth is $12,000. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
